# `aek install`

Synonomous with `npm install`, used to install a specified dependency or global package.

```bash
aek install [package]
```

Details for usage can be obtained using `aek help install`

```bash
Usage: aek install [options]

Options:
   --username
   --password
   --save
   --save-dev
   --save-optional
   --save-exact
   -g, --global
```
